sections.title: Questions - Identification of Economic Operators - Article 23

questions.title: Upstream Traceability
questions.content: Can you provide, upon request, the **name and address of any economic operator who supplied you** with the product with digital elements?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.

questions.title: Downstream Traceability
questions.content: Where applicable, can you provide, upon request, the **name and address of any economic operator to whom you have supplied** the product with digital elements?

questions.title: Retention of Traceability Information
questions.content: Do you retain the upstream and downstream identification information for **at least 10 years** after receiving the product and **for 10 years after supplying** it?

responses.title: In Progress
responses.description: Work is underway but not yet completed.
